radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Axial CT scan of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis

radiographic_examinations.findings: Large, irregular mass encasing the posterior leaflet of the mitral valve; severely reduced leaflet mobility; pulmonary-artery systolic pressure 67 mm Hg.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction in the size of the mass and a decrease in mean diastolic mitral gradient to 6.9 mm Hg 11 months later.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Mass extending into the left atrium and left ventricle
